item.title: Breathtaking trails
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Setting up a placeholder for all the hikes I’d like to do. As and when time permits, I shall update these listings with more details.

[table id=2 /]

Compiled from Buzzfeed , Lifehack, IndiaHikes and the rest of the internet.

item.title: Leshan Giant Buddha, Mount Emei
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: YouTube put this up on my suggested videos list. Magnificent! Adding the Leshan Giant Buddha to my travel list. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FHOef8Q2K8A
